name: The Chase (lillworkspace)
description:
Chase is dreaming that he's being chased by his math homework! Help him avoid having to do it by guiding him over the stacks of textbooks in his mental landscape. Just like this game, procrastination is an endless cycle...

Now that you have the backstory, you're ready to be dropped right into the game. Just press [space] to jump.

There are a few more features slated, such as score-keeping, a main menu, a restart shortcut, and obstacles with varying x-positions.
